entry.dcterms:description: opinions about performances of doctors, hospital treatments and the nurses' work
entry.dcterms:subject: health condition
labour and employment
censuses
social behaviour and attitudes
health care and medical treatment
person
survey data
cross-section

Made up of two subsamples. Population subsample: 1500 persons, a multi-stage, stratified, probability sample, representative of the entire Hungarian population. The surgery subsample includes outpatients (1008 persons) of doctors drawn from the family doctor sample. In the case of patients under 15 years that parent answered which knows best the medical treatment of the child.
face-to-face interview
A
